section.title: Introduction
section.para: The core module now contains all the glue to make everything work together. The core module is responsible for starting up all the services required for the other modules. For future releases, we will decouple all the functionality for each specific service in different modules. For the sake of simplicity, when we start the core module, we start the following sub components and services:

All these components are required by the other modules in order to work and the core module is in charge of starting them. For real scenarios, all these services will be completely decoupled and started separately by different roles.
